es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.reasoning.bayes.smile

Class ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.reasoning.bayes.smile.ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability

  • public class ShanksAgentBayesianReasoningCapability
extends Object
    This class defines the behavior of an agent that inherits Bayesian Reasoning Capability.

    a.carrera
